column1: Smoque BBQ////Just picked up for dinner on Friday night.  Ordered  on the phone
column2: and the person who took the order was very helpful - as I wasn't certain about portions and sides
column3: .  I asked for a specific time on a Friday night.  It was ready
column5: easy peasy.  I had two Texan's over and they raved!  At one point whispering between one another just how the ribs were. We had such a fun night because every one's mouth was doing the happy dance.  Smoque doesn't rest on it's laurels
column6: they keep their standards up.  Of course
